People

We are looking for new PhD students to join the team (see openings) !

Tapomayukh "Tapo" Bhattacharjee


Assistant Professor, starting Summer 2021
Email: tapomayukh AT cornell dot edu

Tapo wants to enable robots to assist people with mobility limitations with activities of daily living. He believes that efficient and safe physical interactions between robots and their immediate environments is the key. His work spans the fields of human-robot interaction, haptic perception, and robot manipulation.

This could be you !
